productText:
000
FZAK51 PAJK 151210
CWFAJK

Coastal Waters Forecast for Southeast Alaska
National Weather Service JUNEAU AK
410 AM AKDT Thu Jun 15 2023

Southeast Alaska Inside Waters from Dixon Entrance to Skagway

Wind forecasts reflect the predominant speed and direction
expected. Sea forecasts represent the average of the highest
one-third of the combined windwave and swell height.

PKZ098-160245-
410 AM AKDT Thu Jun 15 2023
.SYNOPSIS FOR SOUTHEAST ALASKA INNER CHANNELS COASTAL WATERS...
A gale force front arrives on Thursday. Areas of northerly winds
in the panhandle will switch to southerly as the ridge breaks
down ahead of the front. East West channels will see enhanced
easterly winds Thursday afternoon and through the night into
Friday.  

$$

PKZ011-160245-
Glacier Bay-
410 AM AKDT Thu Jun 15 2023

.TODAY...N wind 10 kt becoming 15 kt in the afternoon. Seas 2 ft 
or less then 3 ft. Rain.
.TONIGHT...N wind 15 kt becoming SE. Seas 3 ft. Rain.
.FRI...SE wind 15 kt increasing to 20 kt in the afternoon.
Seas 3 ft. Rain showers. 
.FRI NIGHT...SE wind 15 kt. Seas 2 ft or less. Showers.
.SAT...NW wind 15 kt. Seas 2 ft or less. 
.SUN...NW wind 10 kt. Seas 2 ft or less. 
.MON...NW wind 10 kt. Seas 2 ft or less. 

$$

PKZ012-160245-
Northern Lynn Canal-
410 AM AKDT Thu Jun 15 2023

.TODAY...N wind 10 kt becoming SE in the afternoon. Seas 2 ft or

.TONIGHT...SE wind 15 kt increasing to 20 kt late. Gusts to 35 kt
late. Seas 4 ft. Rain.
.FRI...S wind 25 kt. Gusts to 35 kt in the morning. Seas 5 ft. 
Showers.
.FRI NIGHT...S wind 20 kt. Seas 3 ft. Showers.
.SAT...S wind 20 kt. Seas 4 ft. 
.SUN...NW wind 10 kt. Seas 2 ft or less. 
.MON...S wind 10 kt. Seas 2 ft or less. 

$$
